item.title: Tesla shareholders passed Elon Musk's $1 trillion package. What analysts are saying
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk's new $1 trillion pay plan consists of 12 tranches of shares that would be granted if Tesla hits certain milestones.

item.title: MP Materials CEO warns investors to approach suddenly hot rare earths industry with caution
item.description: MP Materials CEO James Litinsky said he doesn't want investors "to get burned," cautioning them about the industry's difficult economics.

item.title: Penn Entertainment gets an upgrade from Stifel after ESPN betting deal termination
item.description: The bank upgraded the sports betting stock to buy from hold.

item.title: Deutsche Bank upgrades this Chinese internet provider, calling it next big AI beneficiary
item.description: Deutsche Bank sees shares of Baidu rising 23% from here.

item.title: These energy stocks could see further upside from stronger demand, investor Jay Peters says
item.description: It's time to take a look at some energy stocks that are attractively valued, according to Jay Peters, portfolio manager at NewEdge Wealth.
